headline.main: Where Fat 'Is Not a Dirty Word'

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: CHERYL AFFINITO, of New Haven, said she could not stand watching her friends isolate themselves because they were too ashamed of their weight to go out in public. She and a friend, Annette Paffen, of Seymour, responded last fall by organizing the Connecticut chapter of the National Association to Advance Fat
